name: Contact (itch) (Formal Snake)
description:
This is a simple space exploration game.

Us humans, always wondered if we were alone in this universe.

So what if i told you we are not alone...

How to download:

Choose your platform, and extract the zip, and open the executable and play!

My game is too heavy for webGL, sorry.

How to play:

For the codes, you need to find the numbers and guess the correct orders.

First code is a reference to a nice number.

The second code is a reference to a famous buggy game.

Press F to enter spaceship.

WASD to move around.

Q and E to rotate ship.

Shift to point down.

Control to point up.

Space to boost.

Coding and game design: FormalSnake

Music by Redline, you can check out his channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7w2mW9qZr0bXcUBG12fOLw

Spaceship models: https://quaternius.com/packs/ultimatespaceships.html
